@nyctaper @markethotelnyc I love that.

Took my 15-year-old little brother to his first real show in the city on Monday, Avey Tare at Market Hotel. Definitely one of the best shows I've ever seen. Reminded me of one of my other absolute favorites: https://t.co/xvFdeESSsW
@katieraffa I drive by that jail occasionally when upstate and wave wistfully, hoping they are all sitting together at a table somewhere
illustrator > sketch

I just got annoyed in advance for when I have to witness a witty millennial ironically bring a can of Pepsi to a protest front line

@morninggloria true story, I tried to give OPD a box of donuts in 2011 and they threw it in the street and told me to get a job

@maxgoldst This question has been bouncing around my head: what figure/org is unilaterally trusted in the US? 

Closest I've got is Mr. Rogers
RT @maxgoldst: @mrejfox The worst part is that neither side seriously considers the possibility that the other is right. No shared truth-fi‚Ä¶
My daily existential worry is about the Death of Facts https://t.co/wroYAMtzmC

RT @NYCMayor: Dear @POTUS,  

The ultimate city of immigrants just had its safest 3 months in modern history.

Stop vilifying our people.‚Ä¶
RT @alexweprin: Hard to ignore MSNBC's rise in the ratings in recent weeks. Number two in all of cable TV, behind only Fox News, last week.‚Ä¶
I‚Äôve read all the think pieces and I still enjoy the newsroom I‚Äôm sorry guys I really am

I love @simple I just found a bunch of money life is great sometimes

RT @tylrfishr: Borderland has been called:

* online exhibit
* web-zine
* photo documentary
* photo essay
* good-internet-thing

http://t.c‚Ä¶
Skype just straight up refusing to start for me is hastening my move to Google Hangouts.
RT @Medium: The Golden Gate gets all the acclaim, while The Bay Bridge does the work. @mischa on why we should paint it gold. https://t. ...
and by "I got" I mean that I cleaned it out and I'm driving it because I never got a chance to, before she sells it or similar.
Now I just want to drive it exorbitantly fast somewhere. Wonder if there's a track / unguarded straightaway anywhere near here....
My mom got a new VW Passat so I got her old manual turbo Passat. Damn that thing drives. After my Honda now I know the appeal of nice cars.
@OakScott No problem, I've been jotting down pieces while traveling myself so I'm not in any big rush...
@OaktownPirate @OakScott @jaspergregory To all those advocating, even passively helping the police, please remember: http://t.co/Psy6h1uq
@OakScott Needs work before I wanna publish, just DM'd you draft. Share with anyone you want who might have more to chime in or other ideas.
@OakScott I've written a rough something in response to the idea that pro-police livestreaming is somehow okay- but needs heavy editing.
Startups, This Is How Design Works ‚Äì by Wells Riley http://t.co/vWmpdtBh via @wellsriley
RT @justizin: The fetishization of nonviolence does not reduce violence. Compassion and community do. You're either on the bus or off th ...
@jaspergregory again, don't agree with you but have your back. Same for lots of #oo I'd say.
RT @OaklandElle: SMH if you think you have "common sense" but don't get why Stephen Hawking is of value to humanity. http://t.co/yj3gJps ...
Maybe it's not much to be proud of, but I finally got Protovis to do things the way my mind works... http://cloud.ejfox.com/5jh2
When will I be able to hold my iPhone out the car window at 30mph to pay instead if using an EZ-Pass at tolls?
New photoblog post: This is what I do http://bit.ly/bxyPgo
Can I have google voice already? No? Really? Well can I at least get that stuff I bought on eBay like a week ago? No? Damn it.
Gonna try and get back into the habit of using Things on Mac & iPhone.
Just bought 2 new pairs of shoes from Urban Outfitters: http://is.gd/qJAX & http://is.gd/qJB4 - Both on sale! Woo!
New photoblog post: A Mile in the Rain http://tr.im/ifCS
I feel like I am going to remember the beginning of Twitter like some people remember the beginning of the internet...
"Against the law, but not wicked or mean, it was wonderful!" - Man on Wire
Gonna watch Man on Wire.
Got home last night and passed right out. Waking up now...
My little brother is enjoying my mcbess wallpaper from Kitsune Noir- instead of sitting at my mac watching a movie, he's looking at it.
Doing some cleaning. Well-needed cleaning.
My custom vans apparently have shipped. So ridiculously excited, which is silly I suppose.But, I'm not one for underestimating small things.
Mobile Photo: My Tweetstats http://tinyurl.com/5zv7hz
Thinking that I'm going to see Death Cab for Cutie at McCarren Park Pool in brooklyn- which looks like a really rad spot to chill.
Arranging clothing and such- packing lazily for my trip to NJ on Sunday. But I'll talk more about that later.
Downloading the new CoD4 maps. Very happy.
Feeling pretty dehydrated.
Haha, excellent! Top Chef season 4 on Hulu, just as I finish Season 3.
@rhymeswithseven No maps yet. =[ should be later today / early tomorrow I hear.
Decided to track "CoD4" on Twitter so I can find out when the new CoD DLC becomes available. Obviously this is the future.

posts.title: Why I Love Obsidian
posts.dek: In which the author's adoration for Obsidian is revealed, celebrating its versatility, customizability, and ingenuity in organizing the written word

commits.message: feat: add vue and anime example
refactor: remove mobile interaction toggle and related touch event handling for cleaner code
style: update typography, spacing, and add loading overlay for improved user experience
feat: enhance StreamGraph and ScrollStreamGraph components with new default layout prop, improved top 5 senders display, and optimized video handling for better user experience
Add .env.template as a safe reference for required environment variables
feat: add error handling components with animated backgrounds and improved navigation; enhance SiteNav for better responsiveness
feat: simplify scroll progress handling and improve performance with a new ultra simple scroll handler for enhanced user experience
feat: enhance narrative components with new visual elements, improved animations, and responsive design adjustments for better user experience

feat: add OG image generator page and composable for dynamic metadata; update .env with SendGrid API key; enhance SiteNav and TechnologyShowcase components; refine styles and layout across various pages
Very very rough skeleton code for unit chart maker.
